description: Lists the latest analytics data for control domains across all of your active assessments. Audit Manager supports the control domains that are provided by Amazon Web Services Control Catalog. For information about how to find a list of available control domains, see ListDomains in the Amazon Web Services Control Catalog API Reference.

nested_items.name: controlDomainInsights
nested_items.description: The control domain analytics data that the ListControlDomainInsights API returned.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the control domain.

nested_items.name: id
nested_items.description: The unique identifier for the control domain. Audit Manager supports the control domains that are provided by Amazon Web Services Control Catalog. For information about how to find a list of available control domains, see ListDomains in the Amazon Web Services Control Catalog API Reference.

nested_items.name: controlsCountByNoncompliantEvidence
nested_items.description: The number of controls in the control domain that collected non-compliant evidence on the lastUpdated date.

nested_items.name: totalControlsCount
nested_items.description: The total number of controls in the control domain.

nested_items.name: evidenceInsights
nested_items.description: A breakdown of the compliance check status for the evidence that's associated with the control domain.

nested_items.name: noncompliantEvidenceCount
nested_items.description: The number of compliance check evidence that Audit Manager classified as non-compliant. This includes evidence that was collected from Security Hub with a Fail ruling, or collected from Config with a Non-compliant ruling.

nested_items.name: compliantEvidenceCount
nested_items.description: The number of compliance check evidence that Audit Manager classified as compliant. This includes evidence that was collected from Security Hub with a Pass ruling, or collected from Config with a Compliant ruling.

nested_items.name: inconclusiveEvidenceCount
nested_items.description: The number of evidence that a compliance check ruling isn't available for. Evidence is inconclusive when the associated control uses Security Hub or Config as a data source but you didn't enable those services. This is also the case when a control uses a data source that doesn't support compliance checks (for example, manual evidence, API calls, or CloudTrail).

nested_items.name: lastUpdated
nested_items.description: The time when the control domain insights were last updated.

nested_items.name: nextToken
nested_items.description: The pagination token that's used to fetch the next set of results.
